sentences.english: During the Chin dynasty of the fourth century, there was a middle-aged man in Shanyin called Kung Yu.
sentences.chinese: 在公元四世纪的秦朝，山阴县有个名叫孔玉的中年人。

sentences.english: During the Chin dynasty of the fourth century, there was a middle aged man in Shanyin called K'ung Yu.
sentences.chinese: 在公元4世纪的陈代，山阴县有个名叫孔玉的中年人。

sentences.english: In the era before the Chin Dynasty, there appeared "Shanyin Old Canal" in East Zhejiang.
sentences.chinese: 先秦时期，浙东就出现了“山阴故水道”。
